description: This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) for a combined shredder/degausser that can destroy mechanical and electronic hard drives, as well as cell phones
full_summary:
=====================================

**Government Tender Announcement**
--------------------------------

### Notice Number and Title
W0133-24Q024_C
Démagnétiseur et Désintégrateur Approuvé par la NSA

### Tender Details
-------------------

**Reference Number**: WS4264226991- Doc4636533083
**Amendment Number**: 4
**Solicitation Number**: WS4264226991

### Publication and Closing Dates
--------------------------------

* **Publication Date**: June 14, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: July 11, 2024, 2:00 PM ET

### Tender Status
------------------

The tender is currently expired.

### Procurement Information
-------------------------

* **Procurement Category**: GD
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Selection Criteria**: Variations or combinations of the above methods

### Goods and Services Description
--------------------------------

Canada seeks bids to supply a Combined Shredder/Degausser, capable of destroying Platter (mechanical) Hard Drives, Solid-State Drives (SSDs), and Mobile Phones.

### Contract Information
----------------------

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information
---------------------

* **Contact Name**: Anthony Mitch (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: mitch.anthony@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Additional Information
-------------------------

Please visit the official notice URL: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20027418?extsite=MjAwMjc0MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20027418?extsite=MjAwMjc0MThfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==) for additional information and tender requirements.

### Regions of Opportunity/Delivery
-----------------------------------

The tender opportunity is available for British Columbia.

### Trade Agreements and Regions of Opportunity
---------------------------------------------

No trade agreements or regions of opportunity apply to this tender.
